item.description:
Â 

When I was working with the dogs this morning, I realized we's lookin' a li'l rusty, HENCE I'm hosting a little impromptu, informal training "party" at my place tomorrow at noon!

This is not an instructional class; this is more for those of you with some training experience who are interested in coming by to work your dog, get some distraction training in, and swap stories, training techniques, new commands and the like.

I got plenty of water/water bowls!

Probably bring:

> Treats/toy/whatever you use to reward your dog.

> Long lead if you need it (my yard isn't fenced)

> Camera? :)

> Whatever training "props" you may need; (i.e. "Place" mat, hoola hoop, retrieving dummy, etc.)

> Water, soda, whatever you like to drink for yourself :)

Please, no flexi-leashes... I've had enough bad experiences that I don't even want them at my house, not even for an informal training practice!

I have no time cap here... Start at noon, go to whenever, maybe even order pizza! :)

Shoot me a text, give me a call or email me for more info or with any questions or concerns. (774) 327-4669/justcassie101@gmail.com/http://www.facebook.com/cassiestock/http://www.facebook.com/HEDogTraining.

Spark, Patches & I thank you in advance for practicing with us!

P.S. If you and your dog have no training experience, you are welcome to come and observe, dogless, if you like. I personally have learned a LOT that way.
item.name: Impromptu, informal training sesh at my house tomorrow (6/26)
